origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceRegulationAPI.get_policy', 'description': 'This function provides the latest financial regulation policies based on the policy type, region, and update date.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policyType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of financial regulation policy, e.g., banking, securities, insurance.'}, {'name': 'region', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The region for which the policy is applicable.'}, {'name': 'updateDate', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The date of the policy update, use 'latest' for the most recent.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'policy', 'description': 'The latest financial regulation policy document.'}]} 
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceRegulationAPI.get_policy, 它的参数输入如下: 'policyType'是'banking', 'region'是'China', 'updateDate'是'latest'.
